content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help you schedule an electrical service appointment. May I have your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Emily! Could you please provide the address where the electrical service is needed?
Thank you, Emily. Let me just confirm that 234 Oak Street, Springfield falls within our service area. One moment please.
Great news! Your address is within our service area. When would be the ideal time for our technician to come by?
Actually, after thinking it over, I don’t think I need the service anymore. So I won’t be needing an appointment. Thanks though!
reason: Customer changed mind about needing service
